findings.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.ubercab.presidio.app.core.root.RootActivity) is not standard.
findings.description: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent.
findings.recommendation: It is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.

findings.title: Broadcast Receiver (com.ubercab.install_referrer.core.InstallReferrerReceiver) is not Protected. [android:exported=true]
findings.description: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device.
findings.recommendation: It is recommended to set the protection level to signature, so only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

findings.title: Service (com.ubercab.external_api.v1.UberApiService) is not Protected. [android:exported=true]
findings.description: A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device.
findings.recommendation: It is recommended to set the protection level to signature, so only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

findings.title: Service (com.ubercab.login.AuthenticationService) is not Protected. [android:exported=true]
findings.description: A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device.
findings.recommendation: It is recommended to set the protection level to signature, so only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

findings.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.braintreepayments.api.BraintreeBrowserSwitchActivity) is not standard.
findings.description: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent.
findings.recommendation: It is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.

findings.title: Activity (com.braintreepayments.api.BraintreeBrowserSwitchActivity) is not Protected. An intent-filter exists.
findings.description: A Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.
findings.recommendation: It is recommended to set the protection level to signature, so only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

findings.description: A Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device.
findings.recommendation: It is recommended to set the protection level to signature, so only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
